description: This table contains a daily snaptshot of the vehicle Controlled Area Network Bus (CAN BUS) types associated with devices for each Samsara organization.

metadata.comment: The date a device was associted with a vehicle CAN BUS
The Samsara ID of the associated device
The Internal ID for the customer's Samsara Org

The CAN BUS ENUM value from the latest device event [CANBUS Enums](https://amundsen.internal.samsara.com/table_detail/cluster/delta/dataprep/device_canbus#:~:text=device%20event%20/n/n-,CANBUS%20Enums,-Amundsen%20was%20last)
